actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-46.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution providing funds for the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct, in carrying out its functions and duties under the rules of the House, to incur such expenses, not to exceed $530,000, as the committee considers appropriate. Stipulates that up to $450,000 of the total amount provided by this resolution may be used to procure consultants' services. States that the authorization granted by this resolution shall expire prior to noon on January 3, 1978.

titles.title: Resolution providing funds for the expenses of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.
